ComicInfo.Summary:
First appearance of Cursed Earth Koburn.
Cover: Two different covers for this issue (both by Frazer Irving featuring Judge Death). Cover B is a homage cover (after Brian Bolland's Batman: The Killing Joke cover)
Judge Dredd - Sturm und Drang (part 1) (Gordon Rennie - Carlos Ezquerra)Judge Death - The Wilderness Days (part 3) (John Wagner - Frazer Irving)Blazing Battle Action - the History of Battle Picture Weekly (part 3) (David Bishop)Devlin Waugh - Red Tide (part 10) (John Smith - Colin Macneil)The Interrogation Cube (subject 008) - Frazer Irving (interview)XTNCT (part 3) (Paul Cornell - D'Israeli)Apocalypse Soon (part 8) (Alan Grant - Shaun Thomas)The Bendatti Vendetta - Blooded (part 3 - final part) (Robbie Morrison - John Burns)2000ad Gold Supplement 011
Cover: Joe Colquhoun (Charley's War)Charley's War (parts 1-5) (reprint from Battle - originally published 6 January to 3 February 1979) (Pat Mills - Joe Colquhoun)Harry Twenty on the High Rock (parts 8-11) (reprint from 2000ad progs 294-297) (Gerry Finley-Day - Alan Davis)
